page.title: 09A day in the life of a child
page.content: My day normally begins at 7.00 a.m.I dress and go downstairs.My breakfast normally consists of coffee and cornflakes.I then wash and watch breakfast T.V.until 8 o'clock.My parents work so I go to my childminders until it is time to go to school at 9.We usually begin the day with assembly,then I do some maths work until break at 10.35 a.m.I work on some English activities until 12 when I go the childminders for lunch.I get back to school at 1.05 and have a few minutes play.We then do our project work,music,games or p.e.At 3.45 I return home and watch T.V until my parents arrive.I feed the rabbit and snake.I have tea then play with my friends.I tidy up a bit and go to bed around 9.00 to 9.45 p.m. {Kieran Jamieson}
